content.json:
### Change Log
Brian Delaney, Clive Watson, Jon Shectman - Microsoft
	
	Version v1.4
	Fixing issue in table names in FullSearch output
	Adding open external query/export to excel to FullSearch Results
	
	Version v1.2
	Added Tag based filters to Incident View
	Added Incident Number filter to Incident View
	Added Application Consent to User IOCs
	Added Logon Type filter for User Account Logons
	Added Defender ATP DeviceLogonEvents to User Account Logons table
	Enabled support for nesting custom workbooks
	Improved samAccountName detection using IdentityInfo table
	Improved Location Anomalies map to color datapoints based on distance
	Other minor improvements
	
	Version v1.1
	Added Investigate by Bookmark
	Added Related Bookmarks to each Investigation type
	Added Investigate FileHash
	Added BehaviorAnalytics for Account Investigation
	Added MFA Fraud Query for Account Investigation
	Added Owner and Status Filters to Incident View
	Added Normalized Network Schema view
	Updated Entity Parsing to add additional entity types
	Updated Incident Timeline to be based on CreatedTime of Incident
	Other minor improvements
	
	
	Version v1.0
	Initial Release

## Investigation Insights Help

### Overview

The Investigation Insights Workbook is designed to assist in investigations of Azure Sentinel Incidents or individual IP/Account/Host/URL entities. The workbook leverages multiple data sources to provide detailed views of frequently used information during the analysis of an incident.

Detailed help on this workbook is maintained at the [Azure Sentinel Github Wiki](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/wiki/Investigation-Insights---Overview).

The workbook is broken up into 2 main sections, Incident Insights and Entity Insights.

#### Incident Insights

The Incident Insights gives the analyst a view of ongoing Sentinel Incidents and allows for quick access to their associated metadata including alerts and entity information.

#### Entity Insights

The Entity Insights allows the analyst to take entity data either from an incident or through manual entry and explore related information about that entity.  This workbook presently provides view of the following entity types:
- IP Address
- Account
- Host
- URL
- FileHash

### Workbook Setup

This workbook can be configured using the parameters at the top of the workbook.  Some of these parameters are only available in Edit mode.


| Parameter | Description |
|---|---|
|Subscription |Select the Azure subscription where your Azure Sentinel instance resides |
|Workspace|Select the Azure Log Analytics workspace where your Azure Sentinel data resides|
|TimeRange|Select the time window you want to Investigate|
|Investigate by|Investigate by Incident allows you to view Sentinel incident data and investigate by entity, Investigate by Entity allows you to proceed directly to entering the entity data manually for your investigation |
| Show Incident Trend |Use this toggle, to see additonal data about the Trends over the past (TimeRange), compared to the last 24hours.|
|Help|Turn on/off this help data, Turn on/off the change log|
|DefaultUPNSuffix|This parameter is used when the entity data does not include a UPN suffix, the value of this parameter will be the assumed suffix|
|AlertID|This parameter should be left blank and is hidden when using the workbook|
|EntityData|This parameter should be left blank and is hidden when using the workbook|
|EntityType|This parameter should be left blank and is hidden when using the workbook|

#### Data Sources

This workbook leverages a number of different data sources.  Most of these data sources are not required for this workbook to function but elements of the workbook may not function if data sources are missing.  Our detailed help located on [GitHub](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/wiki/Investigation-Insights---Overview) includes additional information about which data sources are required for specific capabilities of this workbook.

|Data Source|Type|Data Connector|
|---|---|
| Azure Resource Graph |api| Not Applicable|
| AuditLogs | table| Azure Active Directory |
| AWSCloudTrail | table| Amazon Web Services |
| AzureActivity |table| Azure Activity | 
| BehaviorAnalytics | table | Entity Behavior Analytics |
| CommonSecurityLog |table| Multiple Connectors |
| DeviceLogonEvents |table| Defender ATP |
| DnsEvents |table| DNS |
| IdentityInfo | table | Entity Behavior Analytics |
| OfficeActivity |table| Office 365 |
| ProtectionStatus |table| Azure Security Center with Microsoft Monitoring Agent |
| SecurityAlert |table| Multiple Connectors |
| SecurityBaseline | table | Azure Security Center with Microsoft Monitoring Agent |
| SecurityBaselineSummary | table | Azure Security Center with Microsoft Monitoring Agent |
| SecurityEvent |table| Security Events |
| SecurtityIncident | table| Not Applicable |
| SigninLogs |table|Azure Active Directory |
| ThreatIntelligenceIndicator |table| Threat Intelligence (Platforms and/or TAXII)|
| UpdateSummary |table| Azure Security Center with Microsoft Monitoring Agent |
| Update | table | Azure Security Center with Microsoft Monitoring Agent |
| VMConnection | table | Azure Monitor VM Insights |
| W3CIISLog | table | Microsoft Monitoring Agent |
| WindowsFirewall | table | Windows Firewall |

parameters.name: SelectSeverity
parameters.label: Incident Severity
parameters.query:
let SortOrder = datatable(Value:string, SortOrder:int)
["High", 1, "Medium", 2, "Low", 3, "Informational", 4];
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime {TimeRange:value}
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by IncidentNumber
| summarize Count=dcount(IncidentNumber) by Severity
| extend Label = strcat(Severity," [",Count,"]")
| project Label, Value=Severity
| distinct  Value, Label
| join kind=leftouter SortOrder on Value
| project Value, Label

parameters.name: Status
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime {TimeRange:value}
| where Severity in ({SelectSeverity})
| distinct Status
| sort by Status asc

parameters.name: Owner
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| where CreatedTime {TimeRange:value}
| where Status in ({Status})
| where Severity in ({SelectSeverity})
| project Owner=tostring(Owner.userPrincipalName)
| sort by Owner asc
| extend Owner = iff(isnotempty( Owner), Owner, "Unassigned")
| distinct Owner

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.query:
SecurityIncident
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| mv-expand Labels
| project Tags=replace_string(tostring(Labels.labelName),@"\",@"\\")
| distinct Tags
| sort by Tags asc
| union (datatable(Tags:string)["Untagged"])

content.query:
SecurityIncident
//| summarize IncidentCount=count() by TimeGenerated
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IncidentNumber
| where IncidentNumber == "{IncidentNumber}" or isempty("{IncidentNumber}")
| where CreatedTime {TimeRange:value}
| where Status in ({Status})
| where Severity in ({SelectSeverity})
| where tostring(Owner.userPrincipalName) in ({Owner}) or (isempty(tostring(Owner.userPrincipalName)) and "Unassigned" in ({Owner}))
| summarize IncidentCount=dcount(IncidentNumber) by bin(CreatedTime, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Incident Timeline

content.query:
// lookup all Severities seen in last month 
let pastMonth = SecurityIncident | where TimeGenerated > startofday(ago(30d)) | summarize by Severity;
 SecurityIncident
// lookup Severities from today only
| where TimeGenerated > ago(1d)
| summarize todayCount=count() by Severity
| join kind=fullouter  (pastMonth) on Severity
| join (
 SecurityIncident 
 // from oldest suplied parameter until this time Yesterday 
 | where TimeGenerated between (startofday({TimeRange:start}) .. ago(1d))
 // get avg from oldest date to this time yesterday
 | summarize count() by Severity , bin(TimeGenerated,1d)
 | summarize historyCount = round(avg(count_),1) by Severity
 | extend low  = iif(Severity == "Low","a",""),
          med  = iif(Severity == "Medium","b",""),
          high = iif(Severity == "High","c",""),
          info = iif(Severity == "Informational","d","")
 ) on $left.Severity1 == $right.Severity
 | extend todayCount = iif(isempty(todayCount),0,todayCount)
 | extend trendIs = case(
        todayCount > historyCount,"Trending Up",
        todayCount == historyCount,"Equal",
        todayCount < historyCount,"Trending Down",
        Severity2
 )
| project Severity2, todayCount, historyCount, trendIs, low, med, high, info
| order by high, med, low, info
content.title: Incident Severity Trend - Average count from {TimeRange:label}  vs. Last 24hr Count

content.query:
let SortOrder = datatable(Severity:string, SortOrder:int)["High", 1, "Medium", 2, "Low", 3, "Informational", 4,];
SecurityIncident
| join kind=leftouter SortOrder on Severity
| make-series count() on bin(TimeGenerated,1d) from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}  by Severity
content.title: Incident Severity Trend - Average count from {TimeRange:label}
Incident Status Trend - Average count from {TimeRange:label} vs. Last 24hr Count

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| make-series count() on bin(TimeGenerated,1d) from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain}  by Status
content.title: Incident Status Trend - Average count from {TimeRange:label}

content.query:
union withsource=TableName1 SecurityIncident, SecurityAlert, SecurityEvent, CommonSecurityLog, Syslog
| make-series count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value}  by TableName1
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(count_, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
//| where anomalies[-1] == 1 or anomalies[-1] == -1  
| extend Score = score[-1]
| where Score >= {PositiveAlertThreshold:value} or Score <= {NegativeAlertThreshold:value}
| project TableName1, expectedCounts=baseline[-1], actualCount=count_[-1], Score = score[-1]
content.title: Security Tables detected anomalies: {AnomaliesTimeRange:label},  step {SampleInterval:value}

content.query:
union withsource=TableName1 *
| where TableName1 == '{TableName1}'
| make-series count() on TimeGenerated from {AnomaliesTimeRange:start} to {AnomaliesTimeRange:end} step {SampleInterval:value}
| extend (anomalies, score, baseline) = series_decompose_anomalies(count_, 1.5, 7, 'linefit', 1, 'ctukey', 0.01)
| project-away anomalies, score
content.title: Anomaly graph for the selected table

content.query:
let selectedTags = dynamic([{Tags}]);
SecurityIncident
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*) by tostring(IncidentNumber)
| where IncidentNumber == "{IncidentNumber}" or isempty("{IncidentNumber}")
| where Severity in ({SelectSeverity})
| where Status in ({Status})
| where Labels has_any(selectedTags) or (selectedTags has_any("Untagged") and array_length(Labels) == 0)
| extend Alerts = extract("\\[(.*?)\\]", 1, tostring(AlertIds))
| mv-expand AlertIds to typeof(string)
| join 
(
    SecurityAlert
    | extend AlertEntities = parse_json(Entities)
    | mv-expand AlertEntities
    | extend sortOrder = case 
      ( 
        AlertEntities.Type == "account",1, AlertEntities.Type == "host",2, AlertEntities.Type == "ip",3, AlertEntities.Type == "url",4, 99
      ) 
    | order by sortOrder asc    
) on $left.AlertIds == $right.SystemAlertId
| summarize AlertCount=dcount(AlertIds), entityList=make_set(tostring(AlertEntities.Type)) by IncidentNumber, Status, Severity, Title,  Alerts, IncidentUrl, Owner=tostring(Owner.userPrincipalName) , Tactics =tostring(AdditionalData.tactics)
| where Owner in ({Owner}) or (isempty(Owner) and "Unassigned" in ({Owner}))
// set column order
| project IncidentNumber, Severity, Status, AlertCount,Owner, Title, Alerts, entityList, Tactics, IncidentUrl
| order by IncidentNumber desc
content.title: Incident Details - {TimeRange:label}

formatOptions.linkLabel: Open Incident in the Azure Sentinel Portal

content.query:
SecurityIncident
| where IncidentNumber == '{INexport}' 
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,CreatedTime,Status, Severity, Owner, AdditionalData, IncidentUrl, Comments, Classification, ClassificationComment,Labels, Title, AlertIds) by IncidentNumber
| extend Tactics = todynamic(AdditionalData.tactics)
| extend Owner = todynamic(Owner.assignedTo), IncidentCreated = format_datetime(CreatedTime,'yy-MM-dd HH:mm')
| extend Product = todynamic((parse_json(tostring(AdditionalData.alertProductNames))[0])) 
| extend Tags = extract_all('labelName":"(.*?)"',tostring(Labels))
| extend Owner = case(Owner=="", "Unassigned",Owner), Products = strcat_array(AdditionalData.alertProductNames, ", "), Alerts = tostring(AdditionalData.alertsCount), Bookmarks = tostring(AdditionalData.bookmarksCount), Comments = tostring(AdditionalData.commentsCount), Tactics = strcat_array(AdditionalData.tactics, ", "), Labels = strcat_array(Tags, ", ")
| mvexpand AlertIds to typeof(string)
| join kind=leftouter
(SecurityAlert
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,AlertName, Description, AlertType, Entities)by SystemAlertId) on $left.AlertIds == $right.SystemAlertId
| summarize AlertName = makelist(AlertName), AlertType = makelist(AlertType) by Comments, Labels, Title, Products, AlertsCount = Alerts, Bookmarks, Status, Severity, Owner, IncidentCreated 
| extend AlertNames = strcat_array(AlertName, ", "), AlertTypes = strcat_array(AlertType, ", ")
| project packed = pack_all()
| mv-expand packed
| parse tostring(packed) with * '"' Field '":"' Value '"}'
| where Field in ('Severity', 'Owner','Status','Comments', 'AlertsCount','Products','Title', 'IncidentCreated', 'Labels','Bookmarks', 'AlertNames', 'AlertsType')
| extend Order = case(Field=="Title", 1,Field=="IncidentCreated", 2,Field=="Severity", 3,Field=="Status", 4,Field=="Owner", 5,Field=="Products", 6,Field=="AlertsType",6,Field=="AlertsCount", 7,Field=="Bookmarks", 8, Field=="Labels", 9, 100)
content.title: Incident Summary: {INexport}
content.noDataMessage: Select an Incident to show Summary

content.query:
SecurityAlert
| where SystemAlertId in ({Alerts})
| summarize by  DisplayName, ProductName, StartTime, EndTime,  SystemAlertId, ProviderName
| sort by EndTime desc
content.title: Alerts
content.noDataMessage: Select an incident to show Alerts

content.query:
let AlertEntities = SecurityAlert
| where SystemAlertId == "{AlertID}"
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| extend AlertEntities = parse_json(Entities)
| mv-expand AlertEntities
| where isnotempty(AlertEntities)
| project AlertEntities;
let filehashEntities = AlertEntities
| where AlertEntities.Type =~ "filehash"
| extend Entity = tostring(AlertEntities.Value)
| extend EntityType = strcat(tostring(AlertEntities.Type), "-", tostring(AlertEntities.Algorithm))
| distinct Entity, EntityType;
let fileEntities = AlertEntities
| where AlertEntities.Type == "file"
| extend Entity = strcat(tostring(AlertEntities.Directory), "\\", tostring(AlertEntities.Name))
| extend EntityType = tostring(AlertEntities.Type)
| distinct Entity, EntityType;
let nestedFileHashEntities = AlertEntities
| where AlertEntities.Type =~ "file"
| where isnotempty(AlertEntities.FileHashes)
| mv-expand hashes=AlertEntities.FileHashes
| extend Entity = tostring(hashes.Value)
| extend EntityType = strcat(tostring(hashes.Type), "-", tostring(hashes.Algorithm))
| distinct Entity, EntityType;
let IPEntities = AlertEntities
| where AlertEntities.Type == "ip"
| extend Entity = tostring(AlertEntities.Address)
| extend EntityType = tostring(AlertEntities.Type)
| distinct Entity, EntityType;
let AccountEntities = AlertEntities
| where AlertEntities.Type == "account"
| extend Entity = iff(isnotempty(AlertEntities.UPNSuffix), strcat(AlertEntities.Name, '@', AlertEntities.UPNSuffix), AlertEntities.Name)
| extend EntityType = tostring(AlertEntities.Type)
| distinct Entity, EntityType;
let HostEntities = AlertEntities
| where AlertEntities.Type == "host"
| extend Entity = iff(isnotempty(AlertEntities.DnsDomain), strcat(AlertEntities.HostName, '.', AlertEntities.DnsDomain), AlertEntities.HostName)
| extend EntityType = tostring(AlertEntities.Type)
| distinct Entity, EntityType;
let appEntities = AlertEntities
| where AlertEntities.Type == "cloud-application"
| extend Entity = tostring(AlertEntities.Name)
| extend EntityType = tostring(AlertEntities.Type)
| distinct Entity, EntityType;
let azresEntities = AlertEntities
| where AlertEntities.Type == "azure-resource"
| extend Entity = tostring(AlertEntities.ResourceId)
| extend EntityType = tostring(AlertEntities.Type)
| distinct Entity, EntityType;
let malwareEntities = AlertEntities
| where AlertEntities.Type == "malware"
| extend Entity = tostring(AlertEntities.Name)
| extend EntityType = tostring(AlertEntities.Type)
| distinct Entity, EntityType;
let domResIdEntities = AlertEntities
| where AlertEntities.Type == "DomainResourceIdentifier"
| extend Entity = tostring(AlertEntities.ResourceName)
| extend EntityType = tostring(AlertEntities.Type)
| distinct Entity, EntityType;
let dnsEntities = AlertEntities
| where AlertEntities.Type == "dns"
| extend Entity = tostring(AlertEntities.DomainName)
| extend EntityType = tostring(AlertEntities.Type)
| distinct Entity, EntityType;
AlertEntities
| where AlertEntities.Type == "url"
| extend Entity = tostring(AlertEntities.Url)
| extend EntityType = tostring(AlertEntities.Type)
| distinct Entity, EntityType
| union IPEntities, AccountEntities, HostEntities, filehashEntities, fileEntities, nestedFileHashEntities, appEntities, azresEntities, malwareEntities, domResIdEntities, dnsEntities
| where isnotempty(Entity)
| order by EntityType asc
content.title: Entities
content.noDataMessage: Select an alert to show Entities

parameters.name: CreatedBy
parameters.query:
HuntingBookmark
| extend Entities = parse_json(QueryResultRow).__entityMapping
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, CreatedBy) by BookmarkId
| extend CreatedBy = tostring(parse_json(CreatedBy).Email)
| distinct CreatedBy
| sort by CreatedBy asc

parameters.name: LastModifiedBy
parameters.query:
HuntingBookmark
| extend Entities = parse_json(QueryResultRow).__entityMapping
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, UpdatedBy) by BookmarkId
| extend UpdatedBy = tostring(parse_json(UpdatedBy).Email)
| distinct UpdatedBy
| sort by UpdatedBy asc

content.query:
HuntingBookmark
| extend Entities = parse_json(QueryResultRow).__entityMapping
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, BookmarkName, CreatedBy, UpdatedBy, CreatedTime, Notes, Tags) by BookmarkId
| extend CreatedBy = tostring(parse_json(CreatedBy).Email)
| extend UpdatedBy = tostring(parse_json(UpdatedBy).Email)
| where CreatedBy in ({CreatedBy})
| where UpdatedBy in ({LastModifiedBy})
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
| project BookmarkName, CreatedBy, UpdatedBy, Notes, Tags, BookmarkId
content.title: Bookmarks

content.query:
HuntingBookmark
//| where TimeGenerated > ago(14d)
| where BookmarkId == "{BookmarkId}"
| extend Entities = parse_json(QueryResultRow).__entityMapping
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Entities) by BookmarkId
| extend splitEntities = split(replace(@'["{}]', '', tostring(Entities)),',')
| mv-expand splitEntities
| extend splitEntity = split(splitEntities, ':')
| extend EntityType = tolower(splitEntity[1]), Entity = splitEntity[0]
| where isnotempty(Entity)
| project Entity, EntityType
content.title: Entities
content.noDataMessage: Select a bookmark to see entities.

content.json:
### Entity Insights
---
Choose an Entity Type to investigate by.

parameters.name: IPAddress
parameters.query:
datatable(Entity:string, EntityType:string)
	["{EntityData}","{EntityType}"]
| where EntityType =~ "ip"
| project Entity

content.query:
let Office = OfficeActivity
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ClientIP == "{IPAddress}"
| extend UPN = tolower(UserId)
| summarize Count=count() by UPN;
let AAD = SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where IPAddress == "{IPAddress}"
| extend UPN = tolower(UserPrincipalName)
| project UPN
| summarize Count=count() by UPN;
AzureActivity
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where CallerIpAddress == "{IPAddress}"
| extend UPN = tolower(Caller)
| project UPN
| summarize Count=count() by UPN
| union AAD, Office
| summarize Count=sum(Count) by UPN
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Accounts Active from IP

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where IPAddress == "{IPAddress}"
| where UserPrincipalName =~ "{UPN}" or "AllUPNs" == "{UPN}"
| summarize Count=count() by AppDisplayName
content.title: AAD Signin

content.query:
OfficeActivity
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where ClientIP == "{IPAddress}"
| where UserId =~ "{UPN}" or "AllUPNs" == "{UPN}"
| summarize Count=count() by Operation
content.title: Office Activity

content.query:
AzureActivity
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where CallerIpAddress == "{IPAddress}"
| where Caller =~ "{UPN}" or "AllUPNs" == "{UPN}"
| summarize Count=count() by OperationNameValue
content.title: Azure Activity

content.query:
let Office = OfficeActivity
| where UserId =~ "{UPN}" or "AllUPNs" == "{UPN}"
| where ClientIP == "{IPAddress}"
| extend UPN = tolower(UserId)
| project TimeGenerated, ResultType=ResultStatus, UPN, AppOrAction=Operation, Details=Parameters, Source="OfficeActivity";
let AAD = SigninLogs
| where UserPrincipalName =~ "{UPN}" or "AllUPNs" == "{UPN}"
| where IPAddress == "{IPAddress}"
| extend UPN = tolower(UserPrincipalName)
| project TimeGenerated, ResultType, UPN, AppOrAction=AppDisplayName, Details=ResultDescription, Source="SigninLogs";
AzureActivity
| where Caller =~ "{UPN}" or "AllUPNs" == "{UPN}"
| where CallerIpAddress == "{IPAddress}"
| extend UPN = tolower(Caller)
| project TimeGenerated, ResultType=ActivityStatus, UPN, AppOrAction=OperationNameValue, Details=ResourceId, Source="AzureActivity"
| union AAD, Office
| sort by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Activity Detail

content.query:
let IPList = dynamic(["{IPAddress}"]);
(union isfuzzy=true
(CommonSecurityLog  //Final
| where isnotempty(SourceIP) or isnotempty(DestinationIP)
| where SourceIP in (IPList) or DestinationIP in (IPList) or Message has_any (IPList)
| extend IPMatch = case(SourceIP in (IPList), "SourceIP", DestinationIP in (IPList), "DestinationIP", "Message") 
| summarize FirstOccurance=min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance=max(TimeGenerated), Count=count() by Computer, CommunicationDirection, FirewallAction=DeviceAction, Protocol, SourceIP, DestinationIP, tostring(DestinationPort), IPMatch, Type),
(VMConnection //Final
| where isnotempty(SourceIp) or isnotempty(DestinationIp) 
| where SourceIp in (IPList) or DestinationIp in (IPList) 
| extend IPMatch = case( SourceIp in (IPList), "SourceIP", DestinationIp in (IPList), "DestinationIP", "None") 
| summarize FirstOccurance=min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance=max(TimeGenerated), Count=count() by Computer, CommunicationDirection=Direction, Protocol, SourceIP=SourceIp, DestinationIP=DestinationIp, tostring(DestinationPort), IPMatch, Type
),
(WindowsFirewall //Final
| where isnotempty(SourceIP) or isnotempty(DestinationIP) 
| where SourceIP in (IPList) or DestinationIP in (IPList) 
| extend IPMatch = case( SourceIP in (IPList), "SourceIP", DestinationIP in (IPList), "DestinationIP", "None") 
| summarize FirstOccurance=min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance=max(TimeGenerated), Count=count() by Computer, CommunicationDirection, FirewallAction, Protocol, SourceIP, DestinationIP, tostring(DestinationPort), IPMatch, Type
),
(W3CIISLog //Final
| where isnotempty(cIP)
| where cIP in (IPList) or sIP in (IPList)
| extend IPMatch = case( cIP in (IPList), "SourceIP", sIP in (IPList), "DestinationIP", "None") 
| summarize FirstOccurance=min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance=max(TimeGenerated), Count=count() by Computer, CommunicationDirection="Inbound", SourceIP=cIP, DestinationIP=sIP, DestinationPort=tostring(sPort), IPMatch, Type
)
)
| summarize Count=sum(Count) by Type
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Network Activity

content.query:
let IPList = dynamic(["{IPAddress}"]);
(union isfuzzy=true
(CommonSecurityLog  //Final
| where isnotempty(SourceIP) or isnotempty(DestinationIP)
| where SourceIP in (IPList) or DestinationIP in (IPList) or Message has_any (IPList)
| extend IPMatch = case(SourceIP in (IPList), "SourceIP", DestinationIP in (IPList), "DestinationIP", "Message") 
| summarize Count=count() by IPMatch),
(VMConnection //Final
| where isnotempty(SourceIp) or isnotempty(DestinationIp) 
| where SourceIp in (IPList) or DestinationIp in (IPList) 
| extend IPMatch = case( SourceIp in (IPList), "SourceIP", DestinationIp in (IPList), "DestinationIP", "None") 
| summarize Count=count() by IPMatch
),
(WindowsFirewall //Final
| where isnotempty(SourceIP) or isnotempty(DestinationIP) 
| where SourceIP in (IPList) or DestinationIP in (IPList) 
| extend IPMatch = case( SourceIP in (IPList), "SourceIP", DestinationIP in (IPList), "DestinationIP", "None") 
| summarize Count=count() by IPMatch
),
(W3CIISLog //Final
| where isnotempty(cIP)
| where cIP in (IPList) or sIP in (IPList)
| extend IPMatch = case( cIP in (IPList), "SourceIP", sIP in (IPList), "DestinationIP", "None") 
| summarize Count=count() by IPMatch
)
)
| summarize Count=sum(Count) by IPMatch
| sort by Count desc

content.query:
let IPList = dynamic(["{IPAddress}"]);
(union isfuzzy=true
(CommonSecurityLog  //Final
| where isnotempty(SourceIP) or isnotempty(DestinationIP)
| where SourceIP in (IPList) or DestinationIP in (IPList) or Message has_any (IPList)
| extend IPMatch = case(SourceIP in (IPList), "SourceIP", DestinationIP in (IPList), "DestinationIP", "Message") 
| where IPMatch =~ "{IPMatch}" or "{IPMatch}" =~ "None"
| summarize FirstOccurance=min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance=max(TimeGenerated), Count=count() by Computer, CommunicationDirection, FirewallAction=DeviceAction, Protocol, SourceIP, DestinationIP, tostring(DestinationPort), IPMatch, Type),
(VMConnection //Final
| where isnotempty(SourceIp) or isnotempty(DestinationIp) 
| where SourceIp in (IPList) or DestinationIp in (IPList) 
| extend IPMatch = case( SourceIp in (IPList), "SourceIP", DestinationIp in (IPList), "DestinationIP", "None") 
| where IPMatch =~ "{IPMatch}" or "{IPMatch}" =~ "None"
| summarize FirstOccurance=min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance=max(TimeGenerated), Count=count() by Computer, CommunicationDirection=Direction, Protocol, SourceIP=SourceIp, DestinationIP=DestinationIp, tostring(DestinationPort), IPMatch, Type
),
(WindowsFirewall //Final
| where isnotempty(SourceIP) or isnotempty(DestinationIP) 
| where SourceIP in (IPList) or DestinationIP in (IPList) 
| extend IPMatch = case( SourceIP in (IPList), "SourceIP", DestinationIP in (IPList), "DestinationIP", "None") 
| where IPMatch =~ "{IPMatch}" or "{IPMatch}" =~ "None"
| summarize FirstOccurance=min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance=max(TimeGenerated), Count=count() by Computer, CommunicationDirection, FirewallAction, Protocol, SourceIP, DestinationIP, tostring(DestinationPort), IPMatch, Type
),
(W3CIISLog //Final
| where isnotempty(cIP)
| where cIP in (IPList) or sIP in (IPList)
| extend IPMatch = case( cIP in (IPList), "SourceIP", sIP in (IPList), "DestinationIP", "None") 
| where IPMatch =~ "{IPMatch}" or "{IPMatch}" =~ "None"
| summarize FirstOccurance=min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance=max(TimeGenerated), Count=count() by Computer, CommunicationDirection="Inbound", SourceIP=cIP, DestinationIP=sIP, DestinationPort=tostring(sPort), IPMatch, Type
)
)
| where Type =~ "{LogType}" or "{LogType}" =~ "None"

content.query:
let data = DnsEvents
| where ResultCode == 0
| where IPAddresses contains "{IPAddress}" or ClientIP =~ "{IPAddress}"
| extend IPMatch = iff(ClientIP =~ "{IPAddress}", "DNSClientIP", "IPAddressAnswer")
| where IPMatch =~ "{DNSIPMatch}" or "{DNSIPMatch}" =~ "None"
| extend queryID = strcat(Computer, ClientIP, IPAddresses, Name, QueryType);
data
| summarize FirstOccurance=min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance=max(TimeGenerated), Count=count() by DNSServer=Computer, DNSClientIP=ClientIP, IPAddressAnswer=IPAddresses, Name, QueryType, IPMatch, queryID
| join kind = inner (data
| make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by queryID) on queryID 
| project-away TimeGenerated, queryID, queryID1
| project DNSServer, DNSClientIP, IPAddressAnswer, Name, QueryType, IPMatch, Trend, FirstOccurance, LastOccurance, Count
| sort by LastOccurance desc
content.title: DNS Query Details

content.json:
#### Network normalization

This section of the workbook uses a normalized schema for network and requires the installation of parsers in your workspace to function.  Please use the references below to setup the Network Normalization parsers.

- [Normalization in Azure Sentinel](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/normalization)
- [GitHub - Normalized Schema - Networking](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/Parsers/Normalized%20Schema%20-%20Networking%20(v1.0.0))

content.query:
Network_MetaParser
| where SrcIpAddr == "{IPAddress}" or DstIpAddr == "{IPAddress}"
| extend IPMatch = iff(SrcIpAddr == "{IPAddress}", "Source IP Match", "Destination IP Match")
| summarize Count = count() by IPMatch
| order by Count

Network_MetaParser
| where SrcIpAddr == "{IPAddress}" or DstIpAddr == "{IPAddress}"
| extend IPMatch = iff(SrcIpAddr == "{IPAddress}", "Source IP Match", "Destination IP Match")
| where IPMatch == "{IPMatch}" or "{IPMatch}" == "All"
| summarize Count = count() by FirewallAction=DvcAction
| order by Count

Network_MetaParser
| where SrcIpAddr == "{IPAddress}" or DstIpAddr == "{IPAddress}"
| where DvcAction == "{FirewallAction}" or "{FirewallAction}" == "All"
| extend IPMatch = iff(SrcIpAddr == "{IPAddress}", "Source IP Match", "Destination IP Match")
| where IPMatch == "{IPMatch}" or "{IPMatch}" == "All"
| summarize Count = count() by SourceIP = SrcIpAddr
| order by Count

Network_MetaParser
| where SrcIpAddr == "{IPAddress}" or DstIpAddr == "{IPAddress}"
| where DvcAction == "{FirewallAction}" or "{FirewallAction}" == "All"
| where SrcIpAddr == "{SourceIP}" or "{SourceIP}" == "All"
| extend IPMatch = iff(SrcIpAddr == "{IPAddress}", "Source IP Match", "Destination IP Match")
| where IPMatch == "{IPMatch}" or "{IPMatch}" == "All"
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationIP = DstIpAddr
| order by Count

Network_MetaParser
| where SrcIpAddr == "{IPAddress}" or DstIpAddr == "{IPAddress}"
| where DvcAction == "{FirewallAction}" or "{FirewallAction}" == "All"
| where SrcIpAddr == "{SourceIP}" or "{SourceIP}" == "All"
| where DstIpAddr == "{DestinationIP}" or "{DestinationIP}" == "All"
| extend IPMatch = iff(SrcIpAddr == "{IPAddress}", "Source IP Match", "Destination IP Match")
| where IPMatch == "{IPMatch}" or "{IPMatch}" == "All"
| summarize Count = count() by DestinationPort = DstPortNumber
| order by Count

Network_MetaParser
| where SrcIpAddr == "{IPAddress}" or DstIpAddr == "{IPAddress}"
| where DvcAction == "{FirewallAction}" or "{FirewallAction}" == "All"
| where SrcIpAddr == "{SourceIP}" or "{SourceIP}" == "All"
| where DstIpAddr == "{DestinationIP}" or "{DestinationIP}" == "All"
| where DstPortNumber == "{DestinationPort}" or "{DestinationPort}" == "All"
| extend IPMatch = iff(SrcIpAddr == "{IPAddress}", "Source IP Match", "Destination IP Match")
| where IPMatch == "{IPMatch}" or "{IPMatch}" == "All"
| summarize Count = count() by ReportingProdcut = EventProduct, SourceIP = SrcIpAddr, DestinationIP = DstIpAddr, DestinationPort = DstPortNumber, ApplicationLayerProtocol = NetworkApplicationProtocol, NetworkProtocol = NetworkProtocol, DeviceAction = DvcAction
| order by Count

ThreatIntelligenceIndicator
| where TimeGenerated > ago(180d)
| where NetworkIP == "{IPAddress}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, Active) by IndicatorId, SourceSystem, Description, ThreatType
| project SourceSystem, Description, ThreatType, Active

content.query:
let UPN = "{UPN}";
let CommonLocation = SigninLogs
| where UserPrincipalName =~ UPN
| extend LAT = round(todouble(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates.latitude), 1)
| extend LONG = round(todouble(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates.longitude), 1)
| summarize Count=count() by LAT, LONG
| top 1 by Count;
let CommonLAT = toscalar(CommonLocation
| project LAT);
let CommonLONG = toscalar(CommonLocation
| project LONG);
SigninLogs
| where UserPrincipalName =~ UPN
| extend LAT = round(todouble(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates.latitude), 1)
| extend LONG = round(todouble(LocationDetails.geoCoordinates.longitude), 1)
| extend KmFromTypicalLocation = geo_distance_2points(CommonLONG, CommonLAT, LONG, LAT) / 1000
| summarize Count=count() by IPAddress, KmFromTypicalLocation, AppDisplayName, ResultDescription
| sort by KmFromTypicalLocation desc

content.query:
let FilteredSignin = SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated {TimeRange}
| where Status.errorCode {SigninStatus}
| where UserPrincipalName =~ "{UPN}"
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies.displayName =~ "{PolicyName}" or "{PolicyName:label}" =~ "Any one"
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies.result in ({PolicyResult})
| distinct Id;
SigninLogs
| where Id in (FilteredSignin)
| extend errorCode = Status.errorCode
| extend SigninStatus = case(errorCode == 0, "Success", errorCode == 50058, "Pending user action",errorCode == 50140, "Pending user action", errorCode == 51006, "Pending user action", errorCode == 50059, "Pending user action",errorCode == 65001, "Pending user action", errorCode == 52004, "Pending user action", errorCode == 50055, "Pending user action", errorCode == 50144, "Pending user action", errorCode == 50072, "Pending user action", errorCode == 50074, "Pending user action", errorCode == 16000, "Pending user action", errorCode == 16001, "Pending user action", errorCode == 16003, "Pending user action", errorCode == 50127, "Pending user action", errorCode == 50125, "Pending user action", errorCode == 50129, "Pending user action", errorCode == 50143, "Pending user action", errorCode == 81010, "Pending user action", errorCode == 81014, "Pending user action", errorCode == 81012 ,"Pending user action", "Failure")
| extend LocationString= strcat(tostring(LocationDetails["countryOrRegion"]), "/", tostring(LocationDetails["state"]), "/", tostring(LocationDetails["city"]))
| project TimeGenerated, Location=LocationString, IPAddress, AppDisplayName, ResourceDisplayName, ResultDescription, ['Sign-in Status'] = strcat(iff(SigninStatus == 'Success', '', ''), ' ', SigninStatus), Id
| sort by TimeGenerated desc

content.query:
let eStatus = dynamic(["0xC000006A", "0xC0000234", "0x18"]);
let secEventID = dynamic([4771, 4625, 4776]);
let secEvents = SecurityEvent
| where TargetUserName =~ "{samAccountName}"
| where EventID in (secEventID)
| where Level == 16
| where (EventID == 4625 and SubStatus in~ (eStatus)) or (EventID == 4771 and Status in~ (eStatus)) or (EventID == 4776 and Status in~ (eStatus))
| extend ResultStatus = case(EventID == 4625, SubStatus, Status)
| extend SourceNameorIP = case(EventID == 4776, Workstation, (EventID == 4625 and isnotempty(WorkstationName)), WorkstationName, IpAddress)
| extend ResultDescription = case(EventID == 4625, strcat(Activity, '  Logon type: ', LogonTypeName), Activity)
| summarize FirstOccurance = min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance = max(TimeGenerated), FailedSigninCount=count(), LocationCount=dcount(SourceNameorIP) by TargetUserName, SourceNameorIP, ResultDescription, StatusCode=ResultStatus
| extend LogSource = "SecurityEvent";
SigninLogs
| where UserPrincipalName =~ "{UPN}"
// Error codes that we want to look at as they are related to the use of incorrect password.
| where ResultType in ("50126", "50053" , "50055", "50056")
| extend OS = DeviceDetail.operatingSystem, Browser = DeviceDetail.browser 
| extend LocationString= strcat(tostring(LocationDetails["countryOrRegion"]), "/", tostring(LocationDetails["state"]), "/", tostring(LocationDetails["city"]))
| summarize FirstOccurance = min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance = max(TimeGenerated), FailedSigninCount=count(), LocationCount=dcount(LocationString) by TargetUserName=UserPrincipalName, SourceNameorIP=IPAddress, LocationString, AppDisplayName, ResultDescription, tostring(Browser), tostring(OS), StatusCode=ResultType
| extend LogSource = "SigninLogs"
| union secEvents
| project TargetUserName, SourceNameorIP, ResultDescription, StatusCode, LocationString, AppDisplayName, Browser, OS, FirstOccurance, LastOccurance, FailedSigninCount, LocationCount, LogSource

content.query:
let events = dynamic([4624, 4625, 4768, 4771]);
let kerbevents = dynamic([4768, 4771]);
(union isfuzzy=true 
(SigninLogs
| where UserPrincipalName =~ "{UPN}"
| where AppDisplayName == "Windows Sign In"
| extend LogonResult = iff(ResultType == 0, "Success", "Failure")
| summarize Count=count(), FirstOccurance=min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance=max(TimeGenerated) by LogonComputerOrIP=tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName), LogonResult, LogonType="AAD/HDJ", ErrorCode=ResultType, DataSource=Type),
(SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (events)
| where TargetUserName =~ "{samAccountName}"
| extend LogonResult = iff(Level == 8, "Success", "Failure")
| extend LogonType = iff(EventID in (kerbevents), "Kerberos TGT", LogonTypeName)
| extend LogonComputerOrIP = iff(EventID == 4768, IpAddress, Computer)
| extend ErrorCode = iff(EventID in (kerbevents), Status, SubStatus)
| summarize Count=count(), FirstOccurance=min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance=max(TimeGenerated) by LogonComputerOrIP, LogonResult, LogonType, ErrorCode, DataSource=Type),
(DeviceLogonEvents
| where AccountName =~ "{samAccountName}"
| summarize Count=count(), FirstOccurance=min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance=max(TimeGenerated) by LogonComputerOrIP=DeviceName, LogonResult=ActionType, LogonType, DataSource=Type))
| where LogonType in ({LogonType})
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Computer Logons

parameters.name: HostAnomalies
parameters.label: Choose Host Anomaly
parameters.description: Toggle New Logons and Rare Processes

content.query:
let starttime = ({TimeRange:seconds}s + 90d);
let endtime = {TimeRange:seconds}s;
let ProcessCreationEvents=() {
let processEvents=SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4688
| where Computer =~ "{Host}"
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(starttime) 
| project TimeGenerated, ComputerName=Computer,AccountName=SubjectUserName, AccountDomain=SubjectDomainName, ProcessPath=NewProcessName, FileName=tostring(split(NewProcessName, '\\')[(-1)]), ProcessCommandLine = CommandLine, InitiatingProcessFileName=ParentProcessName,InitiatingProcessCommandLine='',InitiatingProcessParentFileName='';
processEvents};
let allHostsProcessEvents = SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4688
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(starttime) 
| summarize AllHostsWhereProcessObserved=make_set(Computer), UniqueHosts=dcount(Computer) by FileName=tostring(split(NewProcessName, '\\')[(-1)]);
ProcessCreationEvents
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(starttime) and TimeGenerated < ago(endtime)
| summarize count(), arg_max(TimeGenerated, ProcessPath) by FileName
| join kind=rightanti (
    ProcessCreationEvents
    | where TimeGenerated >= ago(endtime)
    | summarize FirstOccurance = min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance = arg_max(TimeGenerated, ProcessPath) by FileName
) on FileName
| project FileName, ProcessPath, FirstOccurance, LastOccurance
| join kind=leftouter allHostsProcessEvents on FileName
| project FileName, ProcessPath, FirstOccurance, LastOccurance, AllHostsWhereProcessObserved, UniqueHosts
content.title: New Processes on Host {Host} observed during {TimeRange:label}

content.json: *A New Logon is defined as a Logon to the Host from an Account for the first time in seven days.*

content.title: Click to filter by Account

content.query:
let starttime = 7d;
let endtime = 1d;
let LogonEvents=() { 
let logonSuccess=SecurityEvent
| where EventID==4624
| where tolower(Computer) contains tolower("{Host}")
| where tolower(Account) endswith tolower("{Account}")
| where TargetUserName !endswith "$"
| where TargetUserName !contains "NETWORK SERVICE"
| where TargetUserName !contains "LOCAL SERVICE"
| where TargetUserName != "SYSTEM"
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, ComputerName=Computer, AccountName=TargetUserName, AccountDomain=TargetDomainName, IpAddress, ActionType='Logon';
let logonFail=SecurityEvent 
| where EventID==4625
| where tolower(Computer) contains tolower("{Host}")
| where tolower(Account) endswith tolower("{Account}")
| where TargetUserName !endswith "$"
| where TargetUserName !contains "NETWORK SERVICE"
| where TargetUserName !contains "LOCAL SERVICE"
| where TargetUserName != "SYSTEM"
| project TimeGenerated, Activity, ComputerName=Computer, AccountName=TargetUserName, AccountDomain=TargetDomainName, IpAddress, ActionType='LogonFailure';
logonFail 
| union logonSuccess
};
LogonEvents 
| where TimeGenerated > ago(endtime) 
| where ActionType == 'Logon' 
| summarize FirsttOccurance = min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance = max(TimeGenerated), count() by ComputerName, AccountName, Activity 
| join kind=leftanti ( 
LogonEvents 
| where TimeGenerated between(ago(starttime)..ago(endtime)) 
| where ActionType == 'Logon' 
| summarize count() by ComputerName, AccountName 
) on ComputerName, AccountName
| summarize FirsttOccurance = min(FirsttOccurance), LastOccurance = max(LastOccurance), Count=dcount(AccountName) by AccountName, Activity
content.title: New logons to Host Filtered by Account
content.noDataMessage: Click on an Account above to perform the query.

content.query:
let events = dynamic([4624, 4625, 4768, 4771]);
let kerbevents = dynamic([4768, 4771]);
let aadSignIns = SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated > ago(7d)
| where AppDisplayName == "Windows Sign In"
| extend HostShort = split("{Host}", ".", 0)[0]
| where DeviceDetail.displayName contains HostShort
| extend LogonResult = iff(ResultType == 0, "Success", "Failure")
| summarize Count=count(), FirstOccurance=min(TimeGenerated), LastOccurance=max(TimeGenerated) by Account=Identity, LogonResult, LogonType="AAD/HDJ", ErrorCode=ResultType;
SecurityEvent
| where EventID in (events)
| extend LogonResult = iff(Level == 8, "Success", "Failure")
| extend LogonType = iff(EventID in (kerbevents), "Kerberos TGT", LogonTypeName)

| where Account !contains @"Window Manager\DWM"
| extend ErrorCode = iff(EventID in (kerbevents), Status, SubStatus)

| where TargetAccount !contains "NT AUTHORITY"

content.query:
let lastRun = toscalar(UpdateSummary
| where Computer =~ "{Host}"
| summarize max(TimeGenerated));
UpdateSummary
| where tolower(Computer) == tolower("{Host}")
| where TimeGenerated between((lastRun-5m)..lastRun)
//| project CriticalUpdatesMissing, SecurityUpdatesMissing, OtherUpdatesMissing
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, CriticalUpdatesMissing, SecurityUpdatesMissing, OtherUpdatesMissing, TotalUpdatesMissing, RestartPending, ComputerEnvironment

content.query:
let lastRun = toscalar(Update
| where Computer =~ "{Host}"
| summarize max(TimeGenerated));
Update
| where Computer =~ "{Host}"
| where TimeGenerated between((lastRun-5m)..lastRun)
| where UpdateState != "Installed"
| where Classification != "Feature Packs"
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, SourceSystem, Title, Classification, PublishedDate, UpdateState, Product, ResourceId, ResourceGroup, RebootBehavior
